participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Alex often finds solace in music and nature. He has a passionate side that drives his artistic pursuits.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nostalgic, Jordan thrives on connection and enjoys sharing her love for music and dance with others.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.

content.text: hey there , i do believe we never met . . how was your day ?
what do you do for a living ?
